events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our team is excited to review your qualifications and experience.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience as a developer.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will contact you shortly to discuss the next steps in the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview went well, and we are impressed with your experience in software development and problem solving.
Thank you for your prompt response and willingness to proceed with the technical interview. We appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview is scheduled for April 15th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare for questions related to software engineering principles.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and deep knowledge of software architecture.
An HR interview has been scheduled for April 17th at 2 PM UTC to discuss company culture and employment terms with you.
The HR interview went very well, and the team is confident you will be a great fit for our engineering department.
We have prepared an official job offer for you that includes competitive compensation and benefits, reflecting your experience.
Thank you for your feedback and acceptance of the offer. We are excited to welcome you onboard soon.
You have formally accepted the job offer, and we are thrilled to move forward with your onboarding process.
Your onboarding process has started. Please check your email for orientation schedules and training materials.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position is now complete. We look forward to your contributions to our engineering team.
